solution_line_template: Now that he is an adult, Bobby can jump {seconds_per_minute} * {jumps_per_second_adult} = <<{seconds_per_minute}*{jumps_per_second_adult}={jumps_per_minute_adult}>>{jumps_per_minute_adult} jumps per minute.

Bobby can jump {jumps_per_minute_adult} - {jumps_per_minute_child} = <<{jumps_per_minute_adult}-{jumps_per_minute_child}={difference_in_jumps}>>{difference_in_jumps} more jumps than when he was a child.
